p: The comparison in the 3CL pro protease inhibition efficacies of Green Tea, Black Tea, and Haritaki were studied. Both Tea (Green Tea and Black tea) and Haritaki displayed comparable inhibition to protease activity; 50% inhibition at 10 μg/ml and more than 90% inhibition beyond 40 μg/ml. The results suggest that either form of Tea and Haritaki can be a potential anti‐viral agent against the SARS‐CoV‐2 (Figure 5).
